channel.title: Creating Mugger-Pkz V.2 Team
channel.description:
[b][size=10pt][size=10pt]Mugger-Pkz V.2 Development Team[/size][/size][/b]
Hello, I am creating a Development Team for Mugger-Pkz V.2. Before you apply you must post What would you like to be choices below. How long you have coded. How many servers/sources you have coded. How good are you at coding on a scale of 1-10.
Benefits for joining: Admin Or Moderator On The Server Depending On How Much You Do. Admin Or Global Moderator On Forums Depending On How Much You Do. Contact to me from Aim Or E-mail. Contact to other Members.
Below are the things you may apply for. [u][b] Hosters[/b][/u] Master Guru ~~
[u][b]Coders[/b][/u] ~~ ~~
[u][b]Idea Creators[/b][/u] ~~ ~~ ~~
[u][b]Admins[/b][/u] ~~ ~~ ~~ [u][b] Moderators[/b][/u] ~~ ~~ ~~ [u][b] Forum Admins[/b][/u] ~~ ~~ [u][b] Forum Moderators[/b][/u] ~~ ~~ ~~
I Hope You Join:)

item.title: Creating Mugger-Pkz V.2 Team
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

3 hosters? 4 ‘coders’? Aren’t you a little over expectant? Program your own server. Hire after it’s successful.

Read full topic
